scripts.say: A-Are you saying that I was mistaken...
Giant Fubuki turned into light and disappeared to the Hololive headquarters building...!
We have no enemy signatures around us. That was the last one.
Hold on, I'm tired...
We've defeated the last enemy, and all that's left is do something about the Hololive headquarters building in order to make the Mirror Sea disappear right?
But what should we do about the headquarters building? If what Fauxbuki said wasn't wrong, it should be quite reinforced with Siren technology, you know?
The solution is... There's only one thing left to do.
Hehehe, everyone, for what reason do you think we've collected all the TNT blocks so far~?
What are you planning on doing?
... Wait, is she perhaps!
Hehehe, it seems like the time to show off this great Shion's magic has come.
Umm, take care to make sure that you don't cause too much destruction, okay? It wouldn't be good to hurt our Azur Lane friends, right?
...... Thinking about it, I was a little taken aback.
That Fauxbuki. Starting halfway through the fight, I wonder why she didn't make her "pieces" fight even until the end...
I wonder if I'm really just thinking too deep into it...
Well, I guess it's all fine! I'll help carry the TNT over too!
Fubuki, are you okay with this? That building might contain some hints about ways to return back to your world, you know?
Mm~ That might be true, but leaving it as is is a huge annoyance for this world, isn't it?
Besides, everyone else gets it too. That nothing will change even if we're impatient about it!
I-Is that so...?
Everyone, thank you...
Zuikaku, let's help them set up the TNT too!
Oka~y, now set the TNT around the building, because Aqua is going to press the explosion switch~
Hmm~ you guys are going to blow it up after all. Is that really okay? Doesn't the Sakura Empire want Siren technology for themselves?
Siren technology is dangerous. You should know that the best.
Our path is something that we'll carve out with our own hands!
Hm~ Well that's fine. Aight, I'll help out a bit as well!
